attributes.action: No state funeral for Maggie Thatcher
attributes.additional_details: Say no to a state funeral for Maggie Thatcher

government_response.details:
As this e-petition has received more than 10 000 signatures, the relevant Government department have provided the following response:

On Monday 8 April the Prime Minister’s Office announced that, with The Queen’s consent, Lady Thatcher would receive a Ceremonial Funeral with military honours. Further details are available here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/lady-thatchers-funeral
